title: Glass Bell-View Hoagie Spread, Hot Chopped, 16 Ounce
features: Hot peppers chopped and crushed into a delightful topping for hoagies and subs
description: Bell-View was one of the first companies to commercially produce a fresh pack pepper. Our company has prided itself on item selection to differentiate ourselves from the competition. We have extended that spirit of differentiation to the present day product packaging, item selection, product pack and delivery system.
